00078         bool eventFilter(QObject *obj, QEvent *event)
00079         {
00080                 if(event->type() == QEvent::ApplicationActivate
00081                 || event->type() == QEvent::ApplicationDeactivate)
00082                         return true;
00083                 else return QMdiArea::eventFilter(obj, event);
00084         };
